name: Kauppakeskus Like
description: A bustling retail center blending modern commerce with Lielahti’s industrial heritage, featuring shops, services, and community spaces.

name: Lounaskahvila Ståhlberg Lielahti
description: A cozy café in the heart of Lielahti, offering daily lunches and artisan coffee amid industrial historic surroundings.

name: Ravintola Ninan Keittiö Tampere Lielahti
description: A vibrant restaurant serving quality lunches and traditional dishes in a repurposed industrial space, reflecting Lielahti’s commercial growth.

name: Lielahti Innovation Hub
description: A modern tech park fostering startups and innovation in renovated factory buildings, showcasing Lielahti’s dynamic blend of heritage and progress.

name: Lielahti Manor
description: A restored stately home turned cultural center, celebrating Lielahti’s industrial heritage with exhibitions, events, and community initiatives.

name: Lielahti Sports Park
description: A rejuvenated park featuring sports fields, outdoor gym, and playground, integrating leisure facilities within Lielahti’s historic industrial landscape.

name: Possijärvenkatu 1 Business Center
description: A contemporary office complex offering flexible workspaces at Possijärvenkatu 1, embodying Lielahti’s shift from factories to modern commerce.

name: Lielahtikeskus A
description: A busy bus stop providing convenient transit connections across Tampere, linking Lielahti’s commercial and industrial districts.

name: Lielahti B
description: A key bus stop in the heart of Lielahti, serving commuters and linking industrial heritage sites with expanding commerce zones.

name: Like Shopping Center Parking Lot
description: A large parking facility adjacent to Like center, accommodating vehicles and supporting Lielahti’s flourishing retail and cultural activities.
